channel.title: Spec command {317}
channel.description: if u can help me plz do so i need a command for mods + for special to go up super fast but idk how and i dont want inf spec cause thats cheating if u do please tell me it and where it goes.

item.title: Spec command {317}
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

search for pickup" then under the }, click enter then add if(command.startsWith("spec") && playerRights >= 1) { specialAmount += 5000; specAttack(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Spec command {317}
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

No problem, Client.java is located in your server folders, So you downloaded the server, double click the folder once you extract it, And find the word “Client” There is two of them, so shift your eyes over to the right and which ever bit says Java, click that one, the other one will say Class.

Read full topic

item.title: Spec command {317}

ok thanks but wheres client.java? sorry im new to coding…

Read full topic

item.title: Spec command {317}
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

Search for one of your commands in client.java. Ok example, Everyone has Pure in there server, so open up client.java, press control F and search for (“Pure”), you will find something like this:

[code]
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 1) {
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(0, 5);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
sM(“Your Now A Pure Tectonic Scape Pker”);
}[/code] Something like that, not exactly. but i will put the spec code under that, and you do the same ok?

[code]
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 1) {
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(0, 5);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
sM(“Your Now A Pure Tectonic Scape Pker”);
}
if(command.startsWith(“spec”) && playerRights >= 1) {
specialAmount += 5000;
specAttack();
}[/code]
Then compile the server and run it.

Read full topic
